VDBMS-0.0.0: A variational database management system

Safe HaskellNone
LanguageHaskell2010

VDB.Condition

Description

Variational conditions in relational algebra and queries.

Synopsis

  • data Atom
    • = Val Value
    • | Attr Attribute
  • data Condition
    • = Lit Bool
    • | Comp CompOp Atom Atom
    • | Not Condition
    • | Or Condition Condition
    • | And Condition Condition
    • | CChc FeatureExpr Condition Condition
